{"id":351290371,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 10 months","timestamp":1591716582,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"144 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/351290371/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"21.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n       \n        int dp[word1.length() + 1][word2.length() + 1]; \n        dp[0][0] = 0; \n        for (int i = 0; i <= word1.length(); ++i) {\n            for (int j = 0; j <= word2.length(); ++j) {\n                if (i == 0) {\n                    *(*(dp + i) + j) = j; \n                }\n                \n                if (j == 0) {\n                    dp[i][j] = i; \n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        for (int i = 1; i <= word1.length(); ++i) {\n            for (int j = 1; j <= word2.length(); ++j) {\n                vector<int> sp = {\n                    dp[i - 1][j - 1] + !(word1[i - 1] == word2[j - 1]),\n                    dp[i - 1][j] + 1,\n                    dp[i][j - 1] + 1\n                }; \n                dp[i][j] = *min_element(sp.begin(), sp.end()); \n            }\n        }\n        \n        return dp[word1.length()][word2.length()]; \n        \n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance"}
